snippet: The military faced a looming disaster on Saturday after an avalanche crashed through a remote mountain base, setting off a rescue scramble that after 18 hours had yielded no survivors.
abstract: Pakistani military faces a looming disaster after an avalanche crashes through a remote mountain base containing 135 people, setting off a high-altitude rescue scramble that has yielded no survivors.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and SALMAN MASOOD

lead_paragraph: The military faced a looming disaster on Saturday after an avalanche crashed through a remote mountain base, setting off a rescue scramble that after 18 hours had yielded no survivors.

headline.seo: Avalanche Traps More Than 100 Pakistani Troops
headline.main: 135 Missing as Avalanche Hits Pakistan Base
headline.print_headline: 135 Missing as Avalanche Hits Pakistan Base
